short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The most frictionless way to save and retain curiosity-inducing and thought-provoking content on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform how you collect and revisit the content that intrigues you with Food for Thought, the Chrome extension designed for the endlessly curious.

Key Features:

- Frictionless Saving: Just press "Ctrl + Shift + E" to seamlessly save any online content - be it tweets, articles, or YouTube videos directly to your personal knowledge database.

- No More Cluttered Bookmarks: Say goodbye to endless browser tabs and scattered bookmarks. Food for Thought keeps everything you find fascinating in one neatly organized place.

- Accessible Everywhere: Your content syncs across devices, ensuring your digital library is always at hand, whether you're on your laptop, tablet, or phone.

Experience a smarter way to manage your online discoveries. Download Food for Thought and redefine your web journey with every click.
